channel.title: How to turn make auto drops?
channel.description: How do i make auto drops?

item.title: How to turn make auto drops?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[code]// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3066, 3952, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3253, 3462, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3096, 3956, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(1917, 3252, 3439, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Light beer
ItemHandler.addItem(3803, 3250, 3422, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Strong beer
ItemHandler.addItem(3801, 3269, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Keg of beer
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3098, 3099, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(590, 3098, 3100, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tinderbox
spawntimer = 100;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to turn make auto drops?

item.title: How to turn make auto drops?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Thats very simple look in you Drops.cfg its pretty self explanatory so take a look although i suggest getting a chest or some sort of item that gives the mods the items that way you put some rights restriction on the box so not just anyone could stumble apon the drop and take it

—Edit—
I think Jordiescape is right but if your server has a drops.cfg you should use it simple because its simpler!
